snippet: Lincoln Center Theater has found the cast for its production of Richard Nelson’s new play, “Nikolai and the Others.”
abstract: Lincoln Center Theater announces cast for its production of Richard Nelson play Nikolai and the Others.
lead_paragraph: Lincoln Center Theater has found the cast for its production of Richard Nelson’s new play, “Nikolai and the Others.”

headline.main: Michael Cerveris to Join ‘Nikolai and the Others’
headline.print_headline: Michael Cerveris to Join ‘Nikolai and the Others’
